11112111111.content:
Melisa's life changed from the very day that she had decided to sell the obese cheerleader to the Berry Circus that had been passing through town. She put the $5000 she had earned into her bank account for safe keeping, spending it would only cause raised eyebrows and questions about just where she had gotten such a big amount of money. She took up exercising, and began to eat healthier, and the pounds just started to slide off her previously overweight frame. She dyed her hair a stunning shade of red, and began to wear clothes that suited her more, changing her from a tubby teenager into a very sleek looking young woman.

The mystery of the missing Jennifer Ried would haunt the town for several years to come. There was simply no trace of the bubbly blond, eyewitnesses had mentioned that they had last seen the cheerleader out on the field for practise, but that there was no sighting of her after that. Rumours ranged from the theory that Jennifer had been brutally murdered and chopped up into tiny pieces, to the fact that the blond had simply ran away from school. No trace was ever found of her, and her parents were left grieving for their beautiful daughter who had been so cruelly snatched away from them.

With the disappearance of her high school bully, Melisa went from strength to strength. She passed her high school exams with amazing grades, got accepted into one of the most prestigious art colleges available, and was coming close to finishing with distinction when she heard that the Berry Circus was back in town.

Melisa couldn't resist, and drove back to her home town for the weekend. The circus itself was the same as the circuses she had remembered as a child, crowded and full of bright colours, with the smell of sweet snacks floating through the air. She made her way through the crowds of excited children and world weary parents, her eye only out for one thing. She passed signs for the Mysterious Mirror Maze, the Bearded Lady, and even The World's Smallest Giant until she reached the particular side show she was so interested in.

It consisted of a very large tent, with a sign proclaiming that the 'Fattest Woman Alive!' resided within the canvas. Melisa smiled a little to herself, tucking a strand of hair behind her ear, before ducking through the flaps into the tent. It wasn't as dark inside as she had expected, fairy lights trailed about the top of the tent to light up the stage that an enormous woman was sat on. She was nothing more than rolls of doughy white flesh, an ill fitting dress struggling to contain her massive girth. Her head seemed tiny on top of such a fat body, her cheeks so fat it looked as if she could barely see.

"Hello," Melisa began softly, ".. Jen." The fat woman stiffened, her eyes opening wide to frantically look for who had spoken, confusion entering them on seeing the slender young woman in front of her. It seemed to hit her all at once just who this young woman was, and a growl of frustration reverberated between overly plump lips.

"You," Jen managed, her voice thick and heavy, "You ... made Jen like this," being treated as nothing more than a freak for so long had altered her speech, "You.. made Jen fat! Change Jen back!" Melisa laughed as she shook her head, daintily moving closer to the dangerously overweight woman.

"No. I told you that you would regret messing with me," Melisa's eyes narrowed as she studied a fold of fat that was nearly the size of her, "And you have. While you're stuck in this freak show only getting fatter and stupider, I'm going places. I've just finished college," she began, lowering her voice, "I've got a boyfriend who loves me. I've got a job lined up for me in the city, I've got an apartment I've just finished furnishing. Just weeks from now I'll be working under one of the most highly renowned artists ever, and you'll be here sweating like a pig." Jen let out a low whine, her flesh trembling from her anger.

"No fair! No fair!" Jen demanded, her fat face flushing dark red in her fury, "Change back.. now!" Melisa shook her head as she began walking away, a soft laugh leaving her.

"No. It's what you get for making fun of me." Jen could only watch helplessly as the unfairly pretty Melisa left the tent to her brand new life, her cries and threats being lost underneath the cheerful circus music that had began to play.
11112111111.title: The Fattest Woman Alive

Back when she'd been thin (though the memory was fading fast from her memory), it had been a snap to just wander home, barely breaking a sweat. Now Jen was drenched from the exertion. Beads of perspiration ran freely down her face and her armpits were stained with circles of sweat.

"I...I don't remember it being so...so...long to get back home," Jen huffed, throwing herself down on the couch as soon as she got inside.

"Yeah, I know it's been getting harder and harder for you to make it to school every day," Melissa said, sitting down next to Jen on the couch to comfort her, "I mean, putting on 8 pounds since the beginning of the school year, that'll really wreak havoc with your stamina."

"Eight pounds!" Jen wailed, throwing her face in her hands to cry, "I haven't gained eight pounds in years!"

Melissa decided it was time to twist Jen's words against her. "Yeah, I know, your weight had really plateaued for a while, but I guess your metabolism has slowed down recently. Maybe you're done growing...well, growing up anyways." She gave Jen's belly a gentle poke. "I guess those eight pounds mean now you'll be growing outwards."

This only caused Jen to cry harder. Melissa put one arm around Jen, feeling a little sorry for her. But just a little.

"There, there, it's okay," Melissa said, "Why don't I get your favorite pick-me-upper?"

Melissa didn't wait for a response, but instead went straight to the kitchen. She mumbled a quick spell and soon the table and counters were filled with all sorts of fattening, irresistible goodies. Cakes, pies, ice cream, candy, cookies...everything a fat girl could ever want. Even Melissa was tempted enough to grab one particularly delicious looking cookie and stuff it into her mouth. It was as delicious as it looked. However, she exerted some self control and instead picked up a cheesecake covered in strawberry sauce and brought it into Jen with a fork.

112221.content:
Spells.com. "Gateway to your hearts desire."

It was plain that Katie Kathcart had no idea that anything was happening to her, and as she watched, she saw the donut was replaced with an entire chocolate cream pie. Katie looked at the pie in her dwindling lap, noticed that her once flat belly was now swelling into a rounded gut...and asked "Uh, Melisa...I...I feel odd. Do you notice anything...different about me?"

Melisa wasn't sure how to answer, but finally just shrugged and said "Nope. You look fine to me. You gonna eat all that pie?"

Katie's snotty attitude came back with a rush, "Well DUH! It's mine, isn't it?"

Melisa typed in a few suggestions on the computer, then said "Yep. It's all yours, sis. Eat hearty."

Katie smirked, then took a slice of pie out and shoved it into her mouth. She looked embarrassed for a moment, then sighed in contentment and chewed, swallowed and went back for another piece. As she did, her upper arms became bigger - not husky now but bluntly fat - and her thighs swelled and thickened.

Slice after slice of the rich desert vanished into her widening mouth. She features were shifting, still looking like her sister...but with a bigger mouth, thicker lips...three fat chins...bloated jowls and cheeks that obscured her smaller, piggish eyes. Her nose swelled and turned up, looking like a pigs snout. Finally, she dug her fat hands with their fat, sausage-like fingers into the pie pan and took the last slice out. She raised it to her mouth...

Melisa feared she'd gone too far. Katie was only 19, but now she was swollen to classic Circus Fat Lady proportions. She was so broad that she filled the sofa with plenty left over. The knees of her trunk-sized legs were spread wide, to accommodate the hang of her huge, swollen belly. Her breasts were like thick, fat-filled pillow cases. She was now dressed in a huge, thrift store dress of floral-patterned fabric that was once loose...but had been grown into from months of unfettered gluttony.

The slice of pie hovered before her...her mouth opened...then closed.

"I feel...I feel so weird. Am...am I fat, Melissa?"

Melissa felt somewhat sorry for her sister, who was easily well over 500 lbs, but said soothingly "Of course your fat, sis. You've ALWAYS been fat. You're my big sister, and you've always had this uncontrollable appetite for sweets. Don't you remember?"

"I...I guess I do..." Katie mumbled, then shoved the last slice of pie into her mouth. She chewed quietly for a moment, deep in sensual pleasure, then started to make contented little pig-grunts when she breathed in through her nose. She didn't seem to notice though, and she said "...I jus' don' (grunt) feel right, Mel. It's (snort) sort of strange, really."

Melissa helped her swollen, 600lb sister to her feet, and guided her to the kitchen. "You're just hungry, sis. Now that you've had your pre-dinner snack, you'll calm down. Mom's making pot roast tonight, you know."

Katies' eyes shined with inner delight, and she allowed herself to be led to the kitchen. She slid into a bench that now sat where she usually did, and though their parents weren't happy with her size, they obviously felt she was unchanged. It was as if Malissas' big sister had always been a gorging, gluttonous fat girl. After dinner (which Katie ate with relish) she helped her waddle to her bedroom and lay down on the bed.

"After all, you don';t want to exert yourself, do you? If you rest after eating, all that food will settle into soft, doughy fat. Won't that be nice?"

Katie smiled up at her skinny (compared to her) sister, and said "Thanks, sis. I'm glad I've got you to look out for me. It's not easy being this (snort) big...this massive...but as long (grunt) as your here..."

Melissa kissed her sister on her blubbery cheek, and turned on her television. She handed Katie the remote, and opened a box of candy for her to snack on. She left Katie contentedly dropping chocolates into her mouth as she watched MTV, and thought "It's AMAZING! Everything I typed...she became. I said she'd eat like a pig, swell to 600lbs, and it happened! I typed that only I would realize that she'd changed, and now everyone - her included - believes she'd the way she always was. I typed that she was a sweet, nice girl who looked up to me, and now...she is."

She went back to the computer, and saw that a flashing box on the screen said "Save Changes?"...

On the table next to desk were several family photos, the last one only taken months ago. In them, they were all the same...except for Katie. Katie had grown from a fat baby, to an obese little girl, and finally a nearly immoble teenager. In the recent family photo though, Katies snotty smirk was replaced with an open, happy smile. She looked sweet. Heck, she was sweet.

Melissa changed the text of the spell again, giving her sister a healthy constitution and ensuring that she'd have no major health issues connected to her weight. She also made her somewhat stronger, so she could more easily waddle about at school.

Then she moved the mouse over to the box...and clicked it. The house felt electric, then settled down...and that was that. Melissa was now the younger sister to a gargantuan fat girl with a sweet, friendly personality...and nobody but her remembered otherwise.

Melisa Kathkart started to wake the next day fully expecting to find that all she'd done the day before had been a dream. That is until...the right side of her bed sunk, causing her to roll to that side and strike against a large, soft mass...that turned out to be Katie Kathcart!

"Katie?" she mutter blearily, wiping sleep from her eyes and gaping at the titan of flesh that threatened to collapse her bed.

"Who else would be waking her sister in the mornin', huh? It's time for breakfast, silly-head. A health breakfast is essential for a growin' girl, I always say. So come on, sis. Let's get goin'!"

The shear size and mass of the 600lb girl sitting on the edge of her bed didn't surprise her as much as her open, honest friendliness. Up until she'd changed her formerly fitness-obsessed, older sister - a girl with whom she'd not exchanged more than a dozen civil words in the last five years - was so openly affectionate to her.

"Sure will." Melisa said, as she rolled out of bed (on the opposite side of Katie) and went into their shared bathroom. She noticed some changes that must have chased the tail of the program, updating the bathroom for a girl Katie's size. The bath tub was gone, replaced with a shower that was at least twice the size of a conventional shower, and with both a downward...and an upward spray. It made sense, when you considered how difficult it must be for a girl of Katies current size to clear her legs and...under-carriage.

She showered - enjoying the twin jets of water - and found her sister getting dressed, apparently deciding between a huge, pink muu-muu with bright yellow flowers, or a jolly, yellow pantsuit clearly designed for a girl of her bulk.

"Which do you think, Mel? I like th' pink, but the suit looks more...professional."

"I'd still pick the pink, Kat. You KNOW it's your favorite color." She answered. She knew what she was talking about, as she'd specifically made that change in her fashion sense last night.

"True..." mused Katie "...but I can wear my pink blouse underneath - the one with the fun, bouncy ruffles at the neck and sleeves. And I'd accent the look with my pink flats, pink earrings, flower broach and hair clips. What do you think?"

Always asking my opinion. As she always would, if I was available.

"That does sound extra fun, Kat. Go for it!"

Katie giggled and asked Melisa to help her dress. It was only fair, as Katie no longer had the full range of movement needed to put on her gigantic panties and hitch her gargantuan brassiere. But Melisa didn't mind. She REVELED in it. Also, she delighted in the sisterly back-and-forth they now had with each other. A companionable chatter that they'd lost during the last few years, that had now clearly never vanished. Melisa asked Katie for her advice about clothes, hair and makeup, and it was plain that though her own tastes had ben changed, she still had her usual fashion sense when dealing with her little sister. She helped her plump (but not even close to her own size) little sister assemble an outfit that actually looked somewhat stylish. Helped her brush and style her hair in a flattering way, and even to apply just the right touches of makeup that she looked almost...pretty.

Heck, that wasn't fair. With her sisters help. she WAS pretty. The girl who looked back at her in the mirror was definitely a plus-sized girl...but she was a plump, plus-sized girl who looked pretty damn good.

Then she glanced at how her sister was dressed...and saw the butt of a thousand jokes.

"Um...'scuse me for a minute, sis." she said, returning to her computer...and opening her Katie's file...

After a few minutes...she returned to the room...and saw her formerly buffoonish garbed sister dressed in a huge (but nice looking) pink swing top and loose, black skirt. makeup and jewelry were tactfully applied. and though she was still huge...she looked like less like a "Fat Lady" stereotype and more like an SSBBW who was proud of her size.

She smiled at her, then asked "What, sis?"

Melisa kissed her new and improved sister on the cheek, and the two of them went downstairs to breakfast.

They did as they were told but his arm wouldn't budge. That moment Katie took a deep breath, sucking them in one go, making her belly expand to almost touch the floor. 12522222222222221.content:
Melisa’s heart thundered in her chest as she went back to reread the title of the spell. She clicked on it, scanning down through the info to make sure that it really would do what she thought it would. The flabby young woman would never admit it, but she was in love with the idea of anthros: the fur, the scales, and everything else. She had numerous files hidden away on her computer filled with some of her favorite sketches, paintings, and so on, of anthro art. The thought of the whole world being like that, that was too enticing for her to bear.

She started repeating the required chant before she even realized it. Her tongue ended up twisted in more than a few places along the way. She hoped that wouldn’t cause any problems.

On the fifth cycle, she was about to give up when an odd shimmer passed before her eyes. Shaking her head and rubbing her eyes, she tried to figure out what it was. That’s when she noticed that the skinny little twig of a woman advertising some sort of diet fad on screen had turned into a skinny little twig of an anthro cat. Same thing with the muscle bound guy in the banner ad at the top; he was a muscle bound anthro wolf now.

Even biting her knuckle wasn’t enough to stop a squeal of delight escaping Melisa’s throat. Her glee died as she looked down at herself and saw the same pasty skin she had before. She babbled “What?” to herself several times as she pulled her shirt up to check the doughy bulge of her stomach. She then whined “No!” to the air as worry settled in that the spell had somehow passed her by. Her protest grew strangled as it felt like the whole world was shifting beneath her. Melisa managed to stumble from her chair to the bed, and knocked over only a few things along the way. Before darkness reached up and dragged her down, her wobbly gaze focused for a moment on her arm, and what she saw buoyed her hopes.

153111121112121122.content:
Melissa suggested "How about we just have some girl chat? We've got a lot of catching up to do!"
The others all found this to be a fun thing. The eleven beautiful young women sat on the ground in a circle.
From there, Melissa got a good look at how all the other princesses were dressed. She examined them closely one at a time going clockwise around the circle.

First there was Jasmine, who was sitting to Melissa's left. She was wearing her trademark light blue sleeveless shirt, and her baggy shorts that she wore with them had transformed into a short blue skirt, leaving all of her white disposable diaper visible. Jasmine had long been Melissa's second-favorite Princess, due to her rebellious behavior and how she had managed to fall in love with a common person, as opposed to all the princesses who had come before her.

Next to Jasmine was Aurora. Of the three Disney Princesses from before the Disney Renaissance, Aurora was Melissa's favorite. Snow White and Cinderella were okay, but Melissa was never really fond of the fact that the only type of love the two of them really knew about was love at first sight. Aurora was wearing a short blouse that was half-blue and half-pink (obviously Flora and Merryweather had something to do with making it). She left her white disposable diaper fully exposed.

Ariel came next. The red-haired princess was wearing a what finely resembled the top of a pink gown. It was adorned with what appeared to be seashells and other objects from the ocean. Melissa thought it was fortunate that she wasn't a mermaid, as she noted how cute Ariel looked in her diaper. Her legs were in very nice shape, as well; given how much she had used them since she chose to live life on the surface above the water.

Cinderella followed. The poor girl turned royal woman looked absolutely elegant in her light blue, wavy dress, resembling the one she had worn on the night of the ball. Melissa smirked lightly when she realized that Cinderella's attire was almost see-thru. Fortunately, it didn't show off too much of her breasts. Her diaper - thankfully - was a solid white and not see-thru in the slightest.

Next there was Pocahontas, the sole American Princess. Pocahontas's outfit was definitely the most revealing. She only had a long strip of cloth tied around her chest and covering her breasts. It still left the top of her cleavage showing nicely. Her "dress" resembled a tube-top, and didn't even come down to the top of her diaper. On that subject, she was wearing a thick white cloth diaper. Melissa figured that this was because of Pocahontas's upbringing in the wild nature, she must have wanted to wear diapers that were more environmental-friendly. Quite commendable of her, actually. Melissa made a note to try out some cloth diapers later on.

Snow White came next. Melissa always had mixed feelings about her, what with her being the most ingenue-like one and therefore the most naive. However, she did not blame her for her faults; everyone had their own faults. Snow White was wearing her blue, white, and red top with the sleeves hanging on her shoulders. Her yellow skirt was only a few inches long, and Melissa saw that the diaper she was wearing was in fact as white as her name.

Rapunzel followed next. The newest and youngest of the group - with the exception of Melissa probably - Rapunzel was wearing the magenta top of her dress, showing off her cleavage a bit. Her pink skirt had shortened and stopped just at the top of her white disposable diaper. Melissa liked her; she was very ambitious and kind, as well as dedicated to those who she cared for. She also thought that her brown hair made her look just as cute as her long blonde hair.

Mulan came after her. She was the sole Asian Princess as well as the only one who did not officially have any royal bloodline in her lineage. However, Melissa had read somewhere that the Emperor made her his honorary daughter after saving China and running an important errand for him with his own daughters. So that technically counted. Aside from that, she was Melissa's third favorite, as she viewed her as the bravest and noblest of the group. Her dress was the top of her navy blue and red kimono which was tied with a fine ribbon just above her thick disposable diaper.

Tiana was the next one. It was not often that Melissa had seen an African American woman in a diaper, but the working-class princess looked absolutely adorable in her outfit! She was wearing a lime green top that resembled the dress she wore on the night she and her husband had opened up their restaurant in New Orleans. Melissa admired how she was so hardworking and committed to her ambitions. She was a sign of hope for the future of Disney. The white diaper she was wearing nicely contrasted her smooth black skin.

Lastly, there was Belle, who was sitting to Melissa's right. Belle had always been Melissa's favorite of the Disney princesses, mostly due to how she was the most cunning, the most selfless, and - indisputably - the most intelligent out of all the Disney princesses. She had on the top of her trademark yellow dress, with the sleeves hanging near the ends of her shoulders and showing off just enough cleavage. Her skirt stopped just at the top of her diaper, showing off her slim figure.

Melissa smiled down at her and said "Looking good, day Belle."

Belle was sitting on her knees. She smiled at Melissa, pulled her close, and kissed her on the forehead as a best friend would. Then she said "You too, Mel. It's great to see you."

Once the eleven beautiful women were settled, Tiana asked "So, what do you girls want to talk about?"

153111121112121122.title: Talk in a circle (girl chat)

1531111211121211221.content:
Ariel suggested "How about we talk about what we've all been up to recently? After all, like Melissa said, we've got a lot of catching up to do."

"That sounds like an excellent idea," stated Mulan, "What should we talk about?"

The eleven beautiful women sat thinking for a few moments. Finally, Rapunzel remarked "Let's talk about our love lives!"

The others giggled at this idea. Of course, they all enjoyed sharing their personal lives with each other as much as the next girl, but it was still a somewhat private subject between them all at times.

After the giggling died down, Snow White said "I don't think that would be a good idea, Rapunzel. Melissa wouldn't be able to join in the conversation."

Melissa blushed a little. She realized she was the only one of the ten that did not have a lover. Belle and Jasmine both shot Snow White a hostile glare. Jasmine said "Leave her alone, Snow. She has plenty of time to find a husband, and - unlike you - she won't just marry the first guy who comes along, claiming to be a prince."

Some of the other women chuckled at Jasmine's remark. Snow White grimaced and stated "I'm not going to take that from the only deuteragonist in this room."

As Melissa knew very well, Jasmine was the only Disney princess that was not the main character of the movie she was from. Melissa did not think that was really a big deal, though.

Just as Belle was about to make a comeback to defend Jasmine, Melissa said "Girls, girls! I invited you over so that we could enjoy each other's company, not to throw petty insults at each other."

The others realized she was right. Snow White and Jasmine quickly apologized to each other. Melissa stated "I'd be alright if you want to talk about your love lives. I can still find something to contribute to in the conversation."

The other princesses decided to go along with the topic.

They began with talking about
1531111211121211221.title: Our own lives

15311112111212112212.content:
The young women decided to talk about their families.

"How's little Beau doing, Belle?" Rapunzel asked the brunette in the yellow dress.

"He's healthy and happy," replied Belle, smiling widely, "I don't think Adam's ever been so proud in his whole life, now that he has a son."

As far as Melissa knew, the only one of the Disney princesses than canonically had children was Ariel, based on The Little Mermaid II. However, she quickly realized that the fantasy world she was in, a certain amount of time must have passed between the end of the Disney movies and the current day. In that time, some of the other princesses must have had children with their husbands.

"Would you like to see a picture of him?" Belle offered the other princesses.

"I'd love to," Melissa replied.

Belle reached into her purse and pulled out a phone (apparently this reality has mixed the eras of the Disney movies with modern-day technology, as well). She opened her phone and selected the "Photos" category. She then chose a photo of her sitting in a chair, cradling a one-year-old baby boy in her arms. In the photo, she was still dressed in what she was currently wearing; her diaper was visibly showing the photo underneath her dress. Her husband Adam - the former Beast - was standing behind the chair with his hands on his wife's shoulders. He was smiling radiantly and he was dressed in his formal royal attire.

"He's adorable, Belle," Melissa remarked sweetly.

"Thank you, Mel," Belle stated as she showed the other princesses the picture on her phone.

"Just out of curiosity, who changes who?" asked Melissa.

"We have a neat little system," Belle remarked, "I change Beau, and Adam changes me. I'm still trying to talk him into trying them out, but he insists that I alone should have the - quote - 'privilege of wearing them.' I'm not entirely certain what he means by that."

"Maybe he feels that indulging himself in such a way could set off a chain reaction that leads to him becoming as greedy as he was before his transformation," Jasmine suggested.

"That's actually a very reasonable hypothesis," Belle stated, "Whatever the reason, I'll talk to him about it when I get back to our castle in France."

"Sounds like a good plan," commented Tiana.

Whose family should we discuss next?
15311112111212112212.title: their families

153111121112121122121.content:
"What about you, Jaz?" Melissa asked the Arabian princess, "How have you and Aladdin been doing?"

"Well, ever since the birth of little Ahmed, he and I have been having much more fun together at night," Jasmine remarked, "I can see why they always say Arabian nights - like Arabian days - more often than not are hotter than hot in a lot of good ways."

"I'll bet it gets REALLY hot in your bedroom at night, Jasmine," remarked Mulan.

The other princesses snickered at the Asian princess's comment. Jasmine just blushed and stated "It's true, Mulan. Aladdin's quite the lover. By the way, shortly after our little boy was born, I actually talked Aladdin into trying out some diapers!"

The other women smiled and congratulated their friend.

"How did you manage that?" inquired Cinderella.

"We had something of a fair trade," Jasmine explained, "You see, girls, don't tell anyone I said this, but Aladdin has something of a bondage fetish."

"Really?" said Aurora, raising an eyebrow, "For how long?"

"I'm not certain," answered Jasmine, "He tells me that he began to suspect it the night where he was arrested by Razoul and the palace guards under Jafar's orders. He was chained to the wall of the dungeon until Abu freed him. At the time, he thought nothing of it. It wasn't until the night after our first 'date' that he confirmed his interest in bondage. That came about when Razoul and the palace guards ambushed him in the palace courtyard and put him in chains and gagged him. He told me after our wedding that he was almost... turned on by being tied up. So I made a deal with him: as long as we indulge in my diaper fetish, we can indulge in his bondage fetish."

"Cool," said Ariel, "How has that been going for you?"

"It's really fun, actually," stated Jasmine, "Right now, Aladdin seems to enjoy the diapers almost as much as he enjoys being tied up, and I enjoy being tied up almost as much as I enjoy the diapers. In fact, sometimes when we're in our room in the palace, we like to reenact what happened to him in the courtyard that night when he came into town as Prince Ali. Except - of course - we take out the part where one of us gets through off a cliff."

"How do you manage that?" queried Pocahontas.

"Genie actually plays the parts of Razoul and the guards," Jasmine replied, "Aladdin and I know we can trust him not to tell anyone about our... hobbies."

"Wait, just how many people know about your interests in bondage and diapers?" asked Tiana.

"Oh, everyone in Agrabah knows that I wear diapers, but no one judges or mocks me for it," Jasmine answered, "However, only Iago, Abu, Carpet, and Genie know about Aladdin's interest in diapers. They're also the only ones who know about our interest in bondage; as they are the only ones we can trust to keep it secret."

"And you like it that way?" said Belle.

"Indeed we do," said Jasmine, "In fact, I'm really happy that our first child was a son, because now I have two beautiful boys in diapers - one of them I brought into this world, and the other is his sexy father!"

The women giggled again at Jasmine's choice of words.

15521222.content:
After her nap Melissa decided she should check on her Katie, but before she got up there was a knock at her door.

"Mistress?" She heard Katie call out.

"Yes, slave what is it?" Melissa responded.

"I have done as you asked, and I wish you to inspect my work." Melissa was shocked. She had only been asleep for two hours and yet Katie seemed to be done. She thought that perhaps some part of her sister was resisting the spell.

'Well, if that's the case, then I'll just make her do it again, and this time I'll double her "workload."' thought Melissa, "Come in Katie, and let's see how good a job you've done."

Slowly Melissa's door opened and a flesh colored orb made it's way through, but before it had gone even a few inches through it stopped. "Mistress Melissa, I am stuck, the doorway is to small for me." Again Melissa was shocked. She turned to her computer and scrolled down the list of spells until she found one that suited her needs. She turned back and waved her hand. Slowly the door enlarged itself until it was a good five feet wide, and still it kept going. Melissa didn't know what to say; she cast a spell that would enlarge the door just enough for Katie to squeeze through, yet the door just kept getting bigger. Finally the door stopped at just over six feet, and Katie started through. The further Katie came into the room, the bigger the shock Melissa felt. Her sister/slave was huge! She must have been at least seven feet wide at her hips. Melissa motioned for Katie to turn full circle so she could get the full picture. Her belly and breasts stuck out at least four feet, with her butt not far behind, with cheeks that were each large enough to contain Melissa comfortably within them, and that was saying something. When Katie was done, Melissa just sat there, gaping. Sensing her confusion, Katie offered an explanation.

"You did ask that I gain weight until I was fatter than you, but you did not specify how much bigger you wanted me, and I was enjoying myself so much that I wanted to keep going until I couldn't go on anymore. I regret that I ran out of food before I was able to achieve that, but surely this is big enough to satisfy you, so please, don't punish me to badly." She then shut her eyes and turned her head to the side, as if waiting to be slapped for her 'failure.' Melissa went to her computer and checked the details of the slave spell. It said that the one under the spell would become meek and timid and always fearful of their Master/Mistress's wrath. She turned back to her Katie, watching her cower in fear. She realized she hated seeing her older sister like this, but realized also that it needed to be done until she had been punished enough. She crossed her room and tried to comfort her sister, but realizing she was way too big for a hug, settled for rubbing and patting her XXXXL belly.

"Don't worry Katie, it's all right. You did nothing wrong, it was my fault for not specifying how large I wanted you. But tell me, now that you are this large, how do you feel? And tell me truthfully." This last she said a bit more forcefully, hoping it would sound like an order to her sister, which she felt would be the only way she would be completely honest with Melissa.

"It feels wonderful, Mistress. So warm, so soft, I feel like I could stay like this forever." Melissa made a note to herself to keep that in mind when she changed Katie back to normal. She also felt her sister/slave's warmth and softness, and wondered how she could use that. She looked around the room and her eyes fell on her bed. Although the covers were new and soft the mattress itself was old and worn, and her parents weren't springing for a new one, trying to use that as an incentive to help her lose weight.

"All right Katie, since you are my slave I think you need to move in here so that you may serve me more easily."

"But Mistress, begging your pardon, but at my size I will not fit in here."

"Oh, I think we can find room for you." With a wave of her hand Melissa's bed was out by the curb, ready for trash pickup. Her covers then appeared on her desk chair, folded and ready for placement. "Ok sweetie, walk over here by the wall, and we'll get you set up." Melissa led her bed-sized sister over to the empty spot where her bed used to be and sat her down gently so as to not rock the house. "There we go dearie, nice and easy, just lay your head back down on the floor and we'll be all set. There we go, you feel ok? Nice and comfy?" Katie nodded, but then motioned with her hands behind her head. Melissa realized she was asking for a pillow. She reach over to the covers and placed all her pillows behind her sister/slave's head, since she wouldn't be needing them anymore. "Better, slave?" Katie smiled in agreement. "Ok, it's almost time for dinner, I'm gonna go eat with mom and dad, and then I'll be back with something for you ok? Ok see you soon." Melissa then left for dinner, leaving her new bed/slave/sister to lie there and contemplate her new life. Not that she had any inkling that she had an old life, mind you.

info.brief_description: You find a site that can grant your wildest dreams. Fetishes Galore! GP's for additions!
info.description:
You are Melisa Kathcart, and overweight teen with a snotty older sister.

You spend most of your days friendless infront of the computer.

One day during one of your mindless google searches you come across Spells.com.

Now you have the chance to fulfill your wildest desires. Will you create your own fantasy world. Or will you use this power to gain revenge on the people who have scorned you.

This story's got a little bit of everything. Weight Gain, Shrinking, Growing, Body Swap, Furry, Alternate Realities, Magical Fantasies, Teleportation, even Diaper spells.

There's something in here for everyone because I'm a sucker for getting additions. If there's not a spell here you want you can make up your own.

PLEASE ADD! GP'S FOR GOOD ADDITIONS!
